CustomField.description: This field maps the Voice Call Issue from the Einstein work summary and addresses the Text Area constraints that prevent direct mapping to the Subject field. It is temporarily hidden field and copied into the Subject.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field maps the Voice Call Issue from the Einstein work summary and addresses the Text Area constraints that prevent direct mapping to the Subject field. It is temporarily hidden field and copied into the Subject.
CustomField.label: Issue
